metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35267 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
NTFS-3G versions < 2021.8.22, a stack buffer overflow can occur when correcting differences in the MFT and MFTMirror allowing for code execution or escalation of privileges when setuid-root.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-35267` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g883 - 1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu5
ntfs-3g - 1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu5').
